findings.title: Main Contract doesnâ€™t import npm packages from source (like OpenZeppelin etc.)
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: Local variables shadowing
findings.description: Rename the local variables that shadow another component

findings.title: Prevent old owner from get back ownership
findings.description: Set previousOwner to zero address after renounce/ transfer ownership because if old owner set own address as previousOwner and renounce/transfer ownership it can be get back from old owner by calling unlock function
